comments:
Hello,
I would like to suggest to offer something like a debugger for the RCP
product... Actually it is quite hard to find a pb and its solution when an error
occurs on launching of a product...
For instance I've the following trace, and even if I look at all my code, I
don't kind where is the pb... It works in normal mode...

Moving the PDE for comment (is there an RCP component somewhere)?

xavier, before you launch, you should use the 'Validate Plugin Set' button on 
the 'Plugins' tab of the Eclipse application launch configuration to foresee 
unpleasant events such as these ones.

Other than that, there is nothing that can be done.

traces.message: No application id has been found.
